channel.title: What I've been working on
channel.description:
Hello, most of you have notice I've been gone for a while. While I can't lie, I have been a little lazy on my dedication. HOWEVER, I haven't had a computer until just last weekend for about a month or two. I've been in and out on others computers, but it didn't make much of a difference.
Anyways, I've been getting into dubstep a lot lately and have gotten into making some stuff. So far I have this:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qa7YM9p-is8
I would appreciate feedback on [b]here[/b]. If you're going to post on youtube it's not like I can stop you. However, I will be checking this thread for your specific feedback, not youtube.

item.title: What I've been working on
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:23, topic:382414”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=478211.msg3502449#msg3502449 date=1297834819]

[quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=478211.msg3502270#msg3502270 date=1297822878]

What happened to you?
[/quote]Is that a good thing?

I love you.
This is seriously impressive for one of your first releases!

I tried to create some dubstep wobbles with fruity loops and used the cutoff mixer but it failed in the most epic proportions. I’m guessing you used the Massive plugin for that bit? You must guide me on how you created that sexy wobble!

As for feedback: a less generic drum beat and more importantly NEEDS MOAR BASSSS!

Thanks f|c I appreciate it :D. I was actually thinking the same thing with the bass. ITS NOT FINISHED THOUGH SO I WILL MAEK ET PERFECT FOAR U

one question, at 0:25-0:40, i hear that in alot of other dubstep vids, not saying you copied this, but just a question, is that some kind of signature beat used in dupstep? Because i hear it alot in dupstep, but it sounds really good.
[/quote]No I didn’t copy anything. I’ll check it out though

No, i know that, im just asking is that like a signature beat on dubstep? Because lots of dubstep songs have that type of beat, and its hawt <3.

0:25

2:24[/quote]
The wobble bass? Yeah that’s pretty common in dubstep haha.

Read full topic

item.title: What I've been working on
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The overall sound was pretty nice. While listening though, there were a few spots where the beats didn’t match up properly for the different sound effects, and I was like “Hmmm…”. Usually those ‘spots’ were only a few seconds. If you need me to I can give you the times of the video were it was like that, because if you fix those it will be perfect.

Read full topic
